statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale_amount FROM SalesData
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM SalesData
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT ROUND(AVG(sale_amount), 2) AS avg_sale_amount FROM SalesData;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_value FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_value > 1000 ORDER BY forecast_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT forecast_value, forecast_date FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData JOIN DemandForecast ON SalesData.sale_id = DemandForecast.forecast_id WHERE SalesData.sale_amount + DemandForecast.forecast_value >= 2000;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, forecast_value FROM SalesData LEFT JOIN DemandForecast ON SalesData.sale_id = DemandForecast.forecast_id WHERE forecast_id IS NULL ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, product_name FROM sales_data ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT id, product_name FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT id, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2022-03-15' AND sales_amount <= 500
SELECT id, product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%hat%'
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY forecasted_sales DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount < 500 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales, AVG(sales_amount) AS avg_sales FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT sales_rep_name, territory FROM sales_reps WHERE commission_rate >= 0.1 ORDER BY territory ASC;
SELECT sales_rep_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_reps JOIN orders ON sales_reps.sales_rep_id = orders.sales_rep_id GROUP BY sales_rep_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT sales_rep_name, territory, commission_rate FROM sales_reps WHERE commission_rate < 0.1
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
